content: 网友提问： wawa你好： 我们已经到了谈婚论嫁的地步了，房子也买了一间小小的，双方家长一起出钱付的首付，贷款我们自己还。他什么事情都做不来，还要冒充有钱的样子。比如说我们去看窗帘，看到一个很贵的，我一想超预算了，就说再看看，他就当着营业员的面问我：你啥意思啦？神经病啊，我们买不起么。最最令人心烦的，是 ......<img width='1' height='1' src='http://rss.feedsportal.com/c/33390/f/640232/p/1/s/72e8b871/mf.gif' border='0'/><div class='mf-viral'><table border='0'><tr><td valign='middle'><a href="http://share.feedsportal.com/viral/sendEmail.cfm?lang=en&title=%E6%9E%81%E5%93%81%E6%9C%AA%E5%A9%9A%E5%A4%AB+%E4%B8%B4%E7%BB%93%E5%A9%9A%E6%88%91%E5%90%8E%E6%82%94%E4%BA%86&link=http%3A%2F%2Flady.163.com%2F12%2F1113%2F16%2F8G71TKLL00261KQ2.html" target="_blank"><img src="http://res3.feedsportal.com/images/emailthis2.gif" border="0" /></a></td><td valign='middle'><a href="http://res.feedsportal.com/viral/bookmark.cfm?title=%E6%9E%81%E5%93%81%E6%9C%AA%E5%A9%9A%E5%A4%AB+%E4%B8%B4%E7%BB%93%E5%A9%9A%E6%88%91%E5%90%8E%E6%82%94%E4%BA%86&link=http%3A%2F%2Flady.163.com%2F12%2F1113%2F16%2F8G71TKLL00261KQ2.html" target="_blank"><img src="http://res3.feedsportal.com/images/bookmark.gif" border="0" /></a></td></tr></table></div><br/><br/><a href="http://da.feedsportal.com/r/1927854193/u/173/f/640232/c/33390/s/1927854193/a2.htm"><img src="http://da.feedsportal.com/r/1927854193/u/173/f/640232/c/33390/s/1927854193/a2.img" border="0"/></a><img width="1" height="1" src="http://pi.feedsportal.com/r/1927854193/u/173/f/640232/c/33390/s/1927854193/a2t.img" border="0"/>
